name: On ZTP Phase (Action Step) in Device Record
description: Record was changed to an action phase and not a status phase (complete, fail, pending, or disable).

conditions.condition: {{ vars.device_metadata_completed < vars.device_metadata_total and "Monitoring" not in vars.ztpphase_last }}

message.content:
Retrieve Device Config

 

Message: {{vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.msg}}

Error: {{vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.error}}

 

{%- if "id" in vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.script_data.data.task_response -%}

TaskID: 

{{vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.script_data.data.task_response.id}}

{%- endif -%}

 

{%- if "id" in vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.script_data.data.task_response -%}

Line: 

{{vars.steps.retrieve_device_config.output.script_data.data.task_response.line|json_query('[].[name,state]')}}

{%- endif -%}

resource.zTPStatusHTML: Done
